derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from cata- 'badly' + Greek tonos 'tone or tension'

encyclopedia.content: Catatonia（紧张症乐队） 回顾整个九零年代中期崛起的威尔斯风潮，Catatonia肯定不是最新奇古怪的那个，但无疑是最有魅力的一组。atatonia的音乐向来具有两面性，清纯感性的一面和激烈张扬的一面，其中尤以前者更具吸引力，更富特色。Catatonia这队来自威尔士的一女四男乐队去年所带来一张甚具流行潜质的热卖专集lnternational Velvet，唱片不但被Melody Maker选为98年度的全年最佳大碟，而当中抽了来作单曲发行的Mulder And Scul

means.word_mean: 1. extreme tonus; muscular rigidity; a common symptom in catatonic schizophrenia
2. a form of schizophrenia characterized by a tendency to remain in a fixed stuporous state for long periods; the catatonia may give way to short periods of extreme excitement
